atk-abh03a37:2_2: Tattha “yasmā arahā sabbaññuvisaye appahīnasaṁyojanova parinibbāyati, tasmā atthi kiñci saṁyojanaṁ appahāya parinibbāna”nti yesaṁ laddhi, seyyathāpi andhakānaṁ;
atk-abh03a37:2_3: te sandhāya pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa.
atk-abh03a37:5_2: Tattha yasmā arahā sativepullappatto parinibbāyantopi sato sampajānova parinibbāti, tasmā kusalacitto parinibbāyatīti yesaṁ laddhi, seyyathāpi andhakānaṁ;
atk-abh03a37:5_3: te sandhāya pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa.
atk-abh03a37:5_4: Atha naṁ yasmā kusalacitto nāma puññābhisaṅkhārābhisaṅkharaṇādivasena hoti, tasmā tenatthena codetuṁ arahā puññābhisaṅkhārantiādimāha.
atk-abh03a37:5_6: Sato sampajānoti idaṁ javanakkhaṇe kiriyasatisampajaññānaṁ vasena asammohamaraṇadīpanatthaṁ vuttaṁ, na kusalacittadīpanatthaṁ.
atk-abh03a37:8_2: Tattha bhagavā catutthajjhāne ṭhito parinibbāyīti sallakkhetvā “arahā āneñje ṭhito parinibbāyatī”ti yesaṁ laddhi, seyyathāpi ekaccānaṁ uttarāpathakānaṁ, te sandhāya pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa.
atk-abh03a37:8_4: Sabbe hi saññino sattā bhavaṅgacitte ṭhatvā bhavaṅgapariyosānena cuticittena kālaṁ karonti.
atk-abh03a37:8_5: Iti naṁ iminā atthena codetuṁ evamāha.
atk-abh03a37:8_6: Tattha kiñcāpi catuvokārabhave arahato pakaticittampi āneñjaṁ hoti, ayaṁ pana pañho pañcavokārabhavavasena uddhaṭo.
atk-abh03a37:8_7: Tasmā no ca vata re vattabbeti āha.
atk-abh03a37:11_2: Tattha atītabhave sotāpannaṁ mātukucchiyaṁ vasitvā nikkhantaṁ disvā “atthi gabbhaseyyāya dhammābhisamayo”ti yesaṁ laddhi, seyyathāpi ekaccānaṁ uttarāpathakānaṁ, te sandhāya pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa.
atk-abh03a37:11_3: Atha naṁ “yadi tattha dhammābhisamayo atthi, dhammābhisamayassa kāraṇehi dhammadesanādīhi bhavitabba”nti codetuṁ atthi gabbhaseyyāya dhammadesanātiādimāha.
atk-abh03a37:11_6: Teneva satto kiriyamayappavattābhāvā sutto, bhāvanānuyogassa abhāvā pamatto, kammaṭṭhānapariggāhakānaṁ satisampajaññānaṁ abhāvā muṭṭhassati asampajāno nāma hoti, tathārūpassa kuto dhammābhisamayoti?
atk-abh03a37:14_2: Tattha acirajātānaṁ pana sotāpannānaṁ arahattappattiṁ suppavāsāya ca upāsikāya sattavassikaṁ gabbhaṁ disvā “atthi gabbhaseyyāya arahattappattī”ti ca supine ākāsagamanādīni disvā “atthi dhammābhisamayo”ti ca “atthi tattha arahattappattī”ti ca idhāpi yesaṁ laddhiyo, seyyathāpi tesaññeva;
atk-abh03a37:14_3: te sandhāya pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa.
atk-abh03a37:17_2: Tattha “atthesā, bhikkhave, cetanā, sā ca kho abbohārikā”ti vacanato “sabbaṁ supinagatassa cittaṁ abyākata”nti yesaṁ laddhi, seyyathāpi ekaccānaṁ uttarāpathakānaññeva, te sandhāya pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa.
atk-abh03a37:17_4: Supinagatassa cittaṁ abbohārikanti idaṁ āpattiṁ sandhāya vuttaṁ.
atk-abh03a37:17_5: Supinagatassa hi pāṇātipātādivasena kiñcāpi akusalacittaṁ pavattati, vatthuvikopanaṁ pana natthīti na sakkā tattha āpattiṁ paññapetuṁ.
atk-abh03a37:17_6: Iminā kāraṇena taṁ abbohārikaṁ, na abyākatattāti.
atk-abh03a37:20_2: Tattha yasmā sabbe dhammā khaṇikā, na koci muhuttampi ṭhatvā āsevanapaccayaṁ āsevati nāma.
atk-abh03a37:20_4: Āsevanapaccayatāya uppannaṁ pana na kiñci atthīti yesaṁ laddhi, seyyathāpi tesaññeva;
atk-abh03a37:20_5: te sandhāya pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa.
atk-abh03a37:20_6: Atha naṁ suttavaseneva paññāpetuṁ nanu vuttaṁ bhagavatā pāṇātipātotiādi ābhataṁ.
atk-abh03a37:23_2: Tattha yasmā sabbasaṅkhatadhammā aniccā, tasmā ekacittakkhaṇikāyeva.
atk-abh03a37:23_3: Samānāya hi aniccatāya eko lahuṁ bhijjati, eko cirenāti ko ettha niyāmoti yesaṁ laddhi, seyyathāpi pubbaseliyāparaseliyānaṁ;
atk-abh03a37:23_4: te sandhāya ekacittakkhaṇikāti pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa.
atk-abh03a37:23_5: Citte mahāpathavītiādīsu tesaṁ tathā saṇṭhānaṁ apassanto paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a37:23_6: Cakkhāyatanantiādi “yadi sabbe ekacittakkhaṇikā bhaveyyuṁ, cakkhāyatanādīni cakkhuviññāṇādīhi saddhiṁyeva uppajjitvā nirujjheyyu”nti codanatthaṁ vuttaṁ.
atk-abh03a37:23_7: Itaro pana antomātukucchigatassa viññāṇuppattiṁ sandhāya paṭikkhipati, pavattaṁ sandhāya laddhivasena paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a37:23_9: Tena hi ekacittakkhaṇikāti yasmā niccā na honti, tasmā ekacittakkhaṇikāti attano ruciyā kāraṇaṁ vadati.
